data.name: ESP32-Fiber-Optic-Star-Map
data.description: Custom ESP32 fiber optic star map that drives 36 RGB LEDs via a custom PCB to replicate a real star chart. Features dual control via physical button or self-hosted WiFi web interface, smooth PWM dimming, rainbow effects, and NVM state saving. Includes full source code, 3D print files, schematics, and PCB KiCAD files.

data.name: costume-creator
data.description: A color editor for a black and white costume file so that it is easy for people to change the colors without having to download software.
